original_text: So the sword is given to be polished, that it may be grasped in the hand. It is sharpened and polished to be given into the hand of the slayer.
korean_text: 그 칼을 손에 잡아 쓸 만하도록 빛나게 하되 죽이는 자의 손에 넘기기 위하여 날카롭고도 빛나게 하였도다 하셨다 하라

sentences.original_text: So the sword is given to be polished,
that it may be grasped in the hand.
to be given into the hand of the slayer.
